definition: under/the underside/below
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 下邊|下边[xia4 bian5]

sentences.english: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest
sentences.chinese: 彼得在下邊，院子裏，來了大祭司的一個使女。

sentences.english: Here are five ways they’re changing the world.
sentences.chinese: 下邊是它們改變世界的五種方式。

sentences.english: To where it bent in the undergrowth.
sentences.chinese: 直到它在樹叢下邊轉彎。

sentences.english: There is a caption under the picture.
This photo is below the sawtooth-shaped car landing edge.
sentences.chinese: 照片下邊是此着陸車的鋸齒形邊緣。

sentences.english: China bares top, with a panties and a skirt.
sentences.chinese: 中國光着上身，下邊一條裙子一條內褲。

sentences.english: She sewed a frill on the bottom of her skirt.
sentences.chinese: 她在她的裙子下邊縫上飾邊。

sentences.english: Can you work out what the underlined words refer to?
sentences.chinese: 你能弄明自下邊劃線的單詞指代的含義嗎？

sentences.english: Your jeans are dirty at the bottom because they touch the ground.
sentences.chinese: 你的工裝褲下邊髒了，因爲下邊蹭着地了。

sentences.english: Your jeans are dirty at the bottom because they touch the ground.
sentences.chinese: 你的工裝褲下邊髒了，因爲下邊蹭着地了。

sentences.english: He understood that he must swim down to the base of the rock from the surface of the water.
sentences.chinese: 他明白了，他必須從水面游到岩石的最下邊。

sentences.english: Republic of door of a version for the double arc postal below.
sentences.chinese: 宮門一版中華民國郵政下邊爲雙線弧形。

sentences.english: The dog cowered under the table when his master raised the whip.
sentences.chinese: 主人舉起鞭子時，狗在桌子下邊抖縮。

sentences.english: The top is hair , following is hair , middle piece is Nebbiolo.
sentences.chinese: 上邊毛，下邊毛，中間一顆黑葡萄。

sentences.english: Here is a website about introduction to subjunctive mood.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬語氣用法比較複雜，下邊這個網址有詳細介紹。

definition: the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously

right side/right, to the right
troublesome/to take a lot of trouble to do sth
left/the left side/to the left of
to serve a meal
over there/yonder
lateral/side/to the side/beside
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
to enter a door/to go in/to learn the basics of a subject/to join one's husband's household upon marriage
this side/here
to attend a lecture/to listen to a talk

inside/interior
here
